author: rnewson
msg: COUCHDB-963 - Erlang processes crash when running the delayed_commits test on Windows Server 2008
- add "-onfail restart_always" to service parameters to increase reliability
- bring service Erlang VM parameters in line with those in couchdb.bat
- improved uninstall by killing epmd first; this allows all binaries to be removed cleanly
- improved install in service mode by hiding popup erlsrv.exe consoles
- use full commandline options for erlsrv to make installer more readable
Thanks to Dave Cottlehuber for the patch.

author: mikl
msg: Added "power" method in "FieldMatrix<T>" interface and default implementation in "AbstractFieldMatrix".

author: mgrigorov
msg: WICKET-3420 javascript with a less than character ("<") fails to execute when added through a header contribution in ajax response
This properly comments the JavaScript and is actually removed by Wicket.Head.Contributor.processScript() in wicket-ajax.js just before creating the new DOM node.
